Class ReviewerHomePage

java.lang.Object
application.framework.BasePage
application.pages.reviewer.ReviewerHomePage
public class ReviewerHomePage extends BasePage
This page displays a simple welcome message for the user and provides navigation. It shows the user's current role and, if multiple roles exist, a dropdown to select another.
Author:
Atharva, Mike

      Description copied from class: BasePage

    • addAnswer

      private void addAnswer()
      Submits a new answer for the currently selected question. The input content is validated and added to the system. The answer list is updated after successful submission.
